name: CHALICE
description:
a short VR experience focused on the most extreme experiences possible in VR. this is an abstract musical experience where the player is taken from location to location in a loose narrative focus on door-to-door face salesman. you can expect to be disorientated slightly nauseous, lost, disturbed amd left with a feeling of dread.

key features

  • interactable VR environments
  • original music
  • intense visuals
  • length 15 minutes

Credits

  • Design - Ben Lunato
  • OST - Noah Chalfant
  • OST - INVISIBLE ROBOT HANDS
